name: scaffixer
description: A context shortcut for scaffolding out entire files and directory trees for when snippets just aren't enough.

scaffixer.templates.markdownDescription:
Setup your Scaffixer templates & prompts.

Example: 
```json
{
    "name": "React Component",
    "description": "Create a new React component directory with SCSS module.",
    "location": "/Users/steve/templates/scaffixer-react-component",
    "prompts": ["Name"]
}
```
   
- `name` [string] Displayed template name.
- `location` [string] Absolute path to a single template directory.
- `description` [string] (optional) Displayed description of template.
- `prompts` [array of strings] Name of values to collect input for template, must match EJS names.

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile && yarn run lint
